items.summary: Replace the About Us page founder image with the user-uploaded photo (c6a6dcf8-f14a-4450-8eef-9d5f3a00cb79.jpg) by processing it into a center-cropped 3:4 portrait and saving it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg`, ensuring it loads correctly at runtime via `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` (no broken/blank image).

Add a short, generic founder bio (in English) in the About Us founder section beneath the founder title. Use the following text exactly: "I’m passionate about helping individuals and families choose the right insurance with clarity, transparency, and long-term support. My goal is to make protection simple—so you can focus on what matters most."
